text: Cass Timberlane is a 1947 American romantic drama movie directed by George Sidney and was based on the 1945 novel of the same name by Sinclair Lewis. It stars Spencer Tracy, Lana Turner, Zachary Scott, Tom Drake, Mary Astor, Albert Dekker, Margaret Lindsay, Josephine Hutchinson, Frank Wilcox and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1947 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by George Sidney
title: Cass Timberlane
